Posts.EditableText:
I just discovered ```console.table()```, and I think I'm in love!

Well, I can't expand the columns . . .  Maybe it's just lust.

Either way, try out ```console.table(game.player)```.  It's pretty cool.
Posts.HTML:
I just discovered console.table(), and I think I'm in love!

Well, I can't expand the columns . . . Maybe it's just lust.

Either way, try out console.table(game.player). It's pretty cool.
